answers.answer: Have you been tested for diabetes?  How is your heart rate at those times?
This could be caused by dehydration , this happened to me once before and i went to the hospital and i were told that i where very very dehydrated which could be awfully dangerous .

question: hi there ,i keep feeling light headed,dizzy turns,face feeling really hot,lack of breath....this only happens in the afternoon ,been eating as normal,plenty off sugar product,please help
title: dizzy turns
